item.title: 事态发展：本周末，阿拉巴马州总检察长办公室外发生一起爆炸装置爆炸事件，相关官员表示，调查正在进行中。
item.description:
DEVELOPING: An investigation is underway after an explosive device was detonated outside the office of the Alabama attorney general this weekend, officials said. https://t.co/518TjUd0K2

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 据当局称，一名 25 岁的现役空军士兵周日在以色列驻华盛顿大使馆外自焚身亡，他自称是对以色列-哈马斯战争的 "极端抗议行为"。
item.description:
An active-duty airman, 25, has died after he set himself on fire Sunday outside the Israeli Embassy in Washington, D.C., in what he described as "an extreme act of protest" over the Israel-Hamas war, authorities say. https://t.co/WtWR2oCrmU

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 据《综艺》杂志报道，瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）将在下个月的奥斯卡颁奖典礼上演唱《芭比娃娃》中的 "I'm Just Ken"。"I'm Just Ken "获本届奥斯卡最佳原创歌曲提名，由高斯林在影片中演唱。
item.description:
Ryan Gosling will take the Oscars stage next month to perform "I'm Just Ken" from "Barbie," according to Variety.

"I'm Just Ken" is nominated for best original song at this year's Oscars and is performed by Gosling in the film. https://t.co/4w8noWvW6R pic.twitter.com/TM3eZKYaP3

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 据《综艺》杂志报道，瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）将在下个月的奥斯卡颁奖典礼上演唱《芭比娃娃》中的 "I'm Just Ken"。
item.description:
Ryan Gosling will take the Oscars stage next month to perform "I'm Just Ken" from "Barbie," according to Variety. https://t.co/W7twBGtTAk

item.title: 警方潜水员正在澳大利亚内陆水道搜寻一对同性情侣的尸体，据称这对情侣一周前在悉尼被一名被抛弃的警察用随身携带的手枪射杀。
item.description:
Police divers are searching inland waterways in Australia for the bodies of a same-sex couple allegedly shot dead in Sydney one week earlier by a jilted police officer with his service pistol. https://t.co/tfh4iOa4TF pic.twitter.com/pzCdkbT8io

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 大批民众聚集在加沙代尔拜莱赫（Deir al-Balah）附近的海滩上，等待空投援助包裹。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Large crowds of people gathered on the beach near Deir al-Balah in Gaza as they waited for aid packages to be air-dropped, with footage showing men on boats retrieving the packages.

More here: https://t.co/8tYGIEYI2z pic.twitter.com/xfeInR0MZ5

item.title: 为什么一些长期服用 COVID 的患者会出现 "脑雾"，这一直是个医学之谜。答案也许终于有了。
item.description:

item.title: 位于布朗克斯区的阿尔伯特-爱因斯坦医学院获得了一笔价值十亿美元的历史性捐赠，这为学生们今后的学习提供了免费学费。
item.description:
A historic, billion-dollar donation to the Albert Einstein College of Medicine in the Bronx has provided students with free tuition moving forward. https://t.co/wrjof6xGeW

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州最高法院做出冷冻胚胎被视为儿童的裁决，颠覆了该州体外受精的使用权，一周多后，越来越多的公众呼声激发了州议会立法运动的希望。
item.description:
More than a week after the Alabama Supreme Court upended in vitro fertilization access in the state with its ruling that frozen embryos are considered children, increasing public outcry has spurred hope for legislative movement in the Statehouse. https://t.co/fLWbwaobp5

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 新消息：曼哈顿地方检察官阿尔文-布拉格（Alvin Bragg）要求法官就前总统特朗普涉及成人电影女演员斯托米-丹尼尔斯（Stormy Daniels）的封口费案件对其下达禁言令。

item.title: 俄克拉荷马州奥瓦索高中（Owasso High School）的学生周一因非二元制学生奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）之死而退学。

item.title: 最新消息：五角大楼在内部审查中得出结论，国防部长劳埃德-奥斯汀（Lloyd Austin）的住院情况之所以被保密，没有任何 "恶意或企图混淆视听 "的迹象。
item.description:
BREAKING: There was no indication of "ill intent or an attempt to obfuscate" for why Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin's hospital stays were kept secret, the Pentagon concluded in its internal review. https://t.co/EHr795F89B

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据新墨西哥州第一司法地区法院称，亚历克-鲍德温（Alec Baldwin）于 2021 年 10 月在《锈迹斑斑》（Rust）片场枪杀摄影师哈丽娜-哈钦斯（Halyna Hutchins）的过失杀人案已定于 7 月开庭审理。
item.description:
BREAKING: The involuntary manslaughter trial for Alec Baldwin over the fatal shooting of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins on the set of "Rust" in October 2021 has been set for July, according to New Mexico's First Judicial District Court. https://t.co/yUx39uVak8

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据联合国近东巴勒斯坦难民救济和工程处（UN Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East）总代表称，1月至2月向加沙提供的人道主义援助减少了50%：
item.description:
LATEST: Humanitarian aid to Gaza dropped by 50% from January to February, according to the commissioner-general of the United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East.

Read more on the Israel-Hamas conflict: https://t.co/og9Bd0dq6w

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 据警方称，肯塔基州一名学生周末被发现死于坎贝尔斯维尔大学的寝室内，警方已逮捕一名与此案有关的嫌疑人。

item.title: 艾米-舒默（Amy Schumer）透露，她被诊断出患有一种名为库欣综合征的荷尔蒙紊乱症。

item.title: 请看：奥德修斯号月球着陆器在月球上的第一张照片已经公布，这是美国50多年来第一个在月球表面软着陆的航天器。
item.description:
SEE IT: The first photo of the Odysseus lunar lander on the moon, the first U.S. spacecraft to make a soft landing on the lunar surface in more than 50 years, has been released. pic.twitter.com/MlpynFWPZF

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 奥德修斯号（Odysseus）月球着陆器在月球上的第一张照片于周一公布，这是美国50多年来第一个在月球表面软着陆的航天器。
item.description:

item.title: 白宫周一宣布，拜登总统将于周四（与特朗普同一天）第二次访问美墨边境，再次推动国会通过一项两党边境协议。
item.description:
Pres. Biden will make his second visit to the U.S.-Mexico border on Thursday — the same day as Trump — to make another push for Congress to pass a bipartisan border deal, the White House announced Monday. https://t.co/sITecTwujt

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 因在《尤里卡》（Eureka）中饰演文森特（Vincent）和在《童年往事》（Once Upon a Time）中饰演斯米（Smee）而为人熟知的演员克里斯-高迪尔（Chris Gauthier）去世，享年 48 岁。
item.description:

item.title: 预计从周一开始，一场强劲的冬季风暴将在西部部分地区降下几英尺厚的积雪，而美国中部大部分地区将沐浴在反常的温暖中。
item.description:
A powerful winter storm is expected to dump several feet of snow in parts of the West starting Monday — while much of the central U.S. will be basking in unseasonably warm conditions. https://t.co/gAxcNcpShI

item.title: 费城警方称，他们正在搜捕一名戴着手铐的囚犯，该囚犯于周一上午逃离了警方，并从一家医院逃走。

Now, her son is saying that her condition is alcohol-induced. https://t.co/ZLMAWvv1dL pic.twitter.com/KidIpe52jB

item.title: 最新消息：匈牙利议会投票批准了瑞典加入北约的申请，从而结束了长达 18 个多月的拖延，这使北约在为应对俄罗斯的乌克兰战争而寻求扩张时受到挫折。
item.description:
JUST IN: Hungary’s parliament has voted to ratify Sweden's bid to join NATO, bringing an end to more than 18 months of delays that have frustrated the alliance as it seeks to expand in response to Russia's war in Ukraine. https://t.co/jyV0SD7ZxX pic.twitter.com/mvJfNoVmdv

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 最新数据显示，尽管房贷利率上调和房价高企带来了双重负担，但一月份的新房销售仍有所增长。
item.description:
New home sales ticked up in January, despite a twin burden imposed by elevated mortgage rates and expensive housing prices, according to new data. https://t.co/MGMWwpOjRV

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 自由潜水员瓦伦蒂娜-卡福拉（Valentina Cafolla）用单鳍无氧冰潜至约 459 英尺深处，创造了新的吉尼斯世界纪录。
item.description:
Freediver Valentina Cafolla bagged herself a new Guinness World Record by ice diving to a depth of around 459 feet with a single fin without oxygen. pic.twitter.com/SRuDJ3iO6a

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024
